document_data.mainbody:
Duddy Dudderken was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Duddy was a human boy with a light olive skin tone, short, curly dark brown hair, and dark brown eyes.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Duddy Dudderken attended a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the Murls Rest plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. The boy obnoxiously yelled demands of bigger and louder magics.
